00020 #ifndef TLM_DEBUG_PAYLOAD_HEADER
00021 #define TLM_DEBUG_PAYLOAD_HEADER
00022 
00023 class tlm_debug_payload
00024 {
00025 public:
00026  // Start address of the transaction:
00027  sc_dt::uint64 address;
00028 
00029  // Indication of a read or write access:
00030  bool do_read;
00031 
00032  // Number of bytes to transfer:
00033  unsigned int num_bytes;
00034 
00035  // Pointer to the data array. Note that the data is always
00036  // organized in the endianness of the host machine (like
00037  // the data pointer in the generic payload):
00038  unsigned char* data;
00039 }; 
00040 
00041 #endif /* TLM_DEBUG_PAYLOAD_HEADER */
